name: Avicoma
tagline: Building software development teams in Ukraine
description: Avicoma (www.avicoma.com) is using the model of creating Dedicated Development Teams to assist small and mid-sized IT companies in augmentation of their Software Development needs. We help our customers hire and retain their own software development team and host them in our own state-of-the-art Eastern Europe locations reducing costs, providing full technical support, and growth the company needs.
